snippet: An experimental Ebola drug healed all 18 monkeys infected with the deadly virus in a study, boosting hopes that the treatment might help fight the outbreak raging through West Africa — once more of it can be made....

headline.print_headline: Experimental Ebola Drug Heals All Monkeys in Study
headline.main: Experimental Ebola Drug Heals All Monkeys in Study

lead_paragraph: An experimental Ebola drug healed all 18 monkeys infected with the deadly virus in a study, boosting hopes that the treatment might help fight the outbreak raging through West Africa — once more of it can be made.
